about_the_game:
This is the original soundtrack for the game Grim Realms. It has been made by the gamedeveloper himself, Mattias Myde, and can now be purchased for your own enjoyment and/or as an additional mean to support the game.

Almost two hours of music, divided into 42 tracks:
- 11 dark and exciting danger-themed.
- 17 upbeat and cosy day-theme.
- 11 calm and sometimes eerie night-themed.
- 6 bonus tracks no longer included, never, or rarely used in the game,
alternative versions and so far one easter egg.

Comes in both MP3- and FLAC-format.
